offer your next trip is closer than you think Heres how to earn thousands of bonus miles when you use Deltas SkyMiles partners Hurry this bonus offer is only available for a limited time See details below IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGESpecial OfferIMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE Earn up to bonus miles plus the miles you earn from each partner Heres how it works just choose participating SkyMiles partners often in any combination and your next award trip could be closer than you think For every times you use a Partner or Partners between November and February youll receive bonus miles in addition to the partner miles you normally earn This winter our SkyMiles partners are offering great savings on hotels and flowers as well as special offers for using MCI long distance or new cellular service with Nextel Earn your bonus miles by simply dining at a SkyMiles Dining affiliated restaurant opening a new Delta SkyMiles Credit Card from American Express account Top IMAGE IMAGE Limit bonus miles per SkyMiles member Offer does not include airline partners Enrollment in the Delta SkyMiles Credit Card from American Express will count as a single partner use Enrollment with a telecommunication partner such as MCI or Nextel will count as a single partner use Stays on successive days in the same city will count only as a single partner use Rentals on successive days in the same city will count as a single partner use Bonus miles will be posted to your SkyMiles account six to eight weeks after February Note This offer is nontransferable SkyMiles account number has been noted as receiving this offer no other SkyMiles account number is eligible The email address registered with this SkyMiles account number is IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE
